responsibility.name: User Interface Design
responsibility.achievement: Designed user interface (UI) for the Web Application by getting in touch with Users and Support personnel. Created mock-ups for rapid usability testing.

responsibility.name: User Interface Development
responsibility.achievement: Developed Web UI for Video Analytics Configuration Application that works on all screen sizes

responsibility.name: API and Web Server
responsibility.achievement: Developed Rest APIs and server using Node.js, Express.js and MySQL. Used Sequelize ORM to reduce database dependency. Set up Internationalization anticipating use in non-English speaking areas.

responsibility.name: Multitenant Architecture
responsibility.achievement: Undertook designing and developing a multitenant architecture.
